name: Tarkin Doctrine
Lore: '''The regional governors now have direct control over their territories. Fear will keep the local systems in line. Fear of this battle station.''',
Text: 'Deploy on Death Star. During your control phase, for each battleground system controlled by your Star Destroyer within 2 parsecs of Death Star, opponent loses 1 Force. Canceled if opponent controls this system.(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
